newsitem.title: USA: Nasdaq stocks close lower as Dow rises.
newsitem.headline: Nasdaq stocks close lower as Dow rises.

text.p: Nasdaq stocks lost about one percent, while the Dow Industrials rose.
The Nasdaq Composite Index slipped 13.54 points to an unofficial close of 1279.43. The Dow Industrials unoffically closed up 20.02 to 6955.48.
Leading the most actives was Intel Corp, which fell on concerns over rival competitive products. Intel was down 1-1/2 at 136-3/8 at the end of day.
Advanta Corp fell 8-1/2 to 31-7/8. On Monday, Advanta said it expected to post a loss of about $0.44 a share for the first quarter, due to increased delinquencies and charge-offs.
Declining issues beat advancing issues, 2685 to 1637. Total volume was 593 million.
The 30-year bond closed down five points to yield 6.96 percent.
